What credit card suitable for $7k local spend ?

There are varying MCCs for online spending on shopping platforms  there is no category that covers all the various MCCs  though some of the MCCs may fall under the Fashion category. Amaze does not change the MCC  only coverts to online. "Online" is not a MCC. MCCs for petrol and Grab ride falls under transport category.

As the folks say  UOB 'Fashion' category is narrow covering clothes  shoes and leather goods. May be u like to consider shopping at departmental stores to increase the chance of getting the mcc required.
